email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Coal - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Hope you're doing well. We have the MV OCEAN WAVE (DWT: 95000, LOA: 250m) available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Cargo size is 75000MT on CIF terms. Starting freight quote is USD 22.50 per MT. Laycan is 15-20 Oct. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Thanks for the quote. USD 22.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

I can offer USD 21.75 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 15,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

USD 21.75 is better. Can we push it to USD 21.50? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 16-21 Oct?

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 21.50 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 16-21 Oct. Please confirm.

Best,
Maria

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Coal - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi Maria,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Summary of Terms - MV OCEAN WAVE
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Here's the summary:
- Vessel: MV OCEAN WAVE
- Cargo: 75000MT Coal
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Discharge Port: Shanghai
- Laycan: 16-21 Oct
- Freight: USD 21.50 per MT
- Demurrage: USD 15,000 per day
- Incoterm: CIF

Please confirm.

Best,
Maria
